product_name: Slime Self-Sealing Smart Presta Tube - 29 x 1.85 - 2.20
long_description: The Slime tube helps keep flat tires from slowing you down. Tubes filled with specially formulated Slime product seals instantly when tube is punctured or pinched. Seals punctures up to one-eighth inch. Slime sealant is nonflammable, nontoxic and water soluble. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Slime tube helps keep flat tires from slowing you down.
